title: Battery drains fast and charges very soon
content: My phone's battery drains alot faster than usual and the performance is starting to lag alot after the new update, when the battery reachs 2% and I connect it to the charger it jumps to 12% almost instantly and keeps climbing till 20% n then charges at a normal pace, I've tried factory reseting a couple of times but till it's the same issue, I'm also facing over heating.
